div.bibl: Chicagoer Arbeiter Zeitung, Jan. 5, 1889. SOZIALER TURNVEREIN.

body.p: The Soziale Turnverein is developing a strength which in this "blossom time of cowards and scoundrels" - can be considered by every sincere friend of progress as a joyous sign of the times. Hardly one year in existence, the club has already bought the lot for building its hall.
It is situated at Belmont and Racine Avenues and cost $5,000. We have only one wish: to see the "Soziale" soon in its own hall - in the interest of all the friends of truth.
